property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Super Infinite evolution Omega—Put this creature into the battle zone on any number of colorless creatures from your graveyard, mana zone or battle zone. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, for each card under this creature, choose one of the following: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into its owner's mana zone. ► Choose one of your opponent's cards in their hand at random and put it into its owner's mana zone. {QUATTRO BREAKER} {ETERNAL OMEGA} (When this creature would leave, return it to your hand instead.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge until you lose or stop yourself. Then for each time you win Gachinko Judge, this creature breaks one of your opponent's shields. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever one of your colorless creatures leaves, you may put a colorless creature that costs the same from your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ATTACK CHANCE}: Shangri-La, Climax of "Cruelty" (When one of your Shangri-La, Climax of "Cruelty"s attacks, you may cast this spell for no cost.) ■ Put a creature from your graveyard. ■ If you have a Zenith, choose one of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent puts that creature into their deck and shuffles it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Super Infinite evolution—Put on one or more of your creatures. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks, you may add a card under this creature to your shields face down. If you do, untap this creature at the end of that turn. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, look at the top card of your deck. If it's a spell, show that spell to your opponent. You may add it to your shields face down. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ While battling a creature that costs 6 or less, this creature gets +2000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, choose another creatureand return it to its owner's hand. Then you may put a creature that costs less than that creature from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the start of your turn, choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs 6 or less and you may return to its owner's hand. Then choose one of your opponent's psychic creatures in the battle zone, you may return to its owner's hyperspatial zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the start of your turn, choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs 6 or less and you may return to its owner's hand. Then choose one of your opponent's psychic creatures in the battle zone, you may return to its owner's hyperspatial zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge until you lose or stop yourself. Then for each time you win Gachinko Judge, you may draw a card. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever any of your creatures attacks, you may put a creature from your opponent's graveyard on top of their deck. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -3000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

card.name: Cut Cake, Evil Guidance of Heaven Descent

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature battles, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, this creature wins all battles until the end of the turn. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, choose any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less and destroy them. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ At the start of your turn, if one of your creatures in the battle zone has higher power then each of your opponent's creatures, look at the top 2 cards of your deck you may put one of them into your hand and the other into your mana zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have a colorless creature in the battle zone, this creature gets +6000 power and "triple breaker". {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge until you lose or stop yourself. Then for each time you win Gachinko Judge, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent.) ■ When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules

card.name: Back to the Ore, Zenith of "Ten Tail"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature, search your deck. You may reveal up to 2 spells that cost 6 or less from among them. Then shuffle your deck. Your opponent chooses one of the revealed spells and puts it into your graveyard. Cast the other card for no cost. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may cast a spell that costs 6 or less from your graveyard for no cost. Then put that spell on the bottom of your deck. {ETERNAL OMEGA} (When this creature would leave, return it to your hand instead.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, or when it leaves the battle zone, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge until you lose or stop yourself. Then for each time you win Gachinko Judge, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -4000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or when this creature leaves the battle zone, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, choose one of the following: ► Put a file:Victory Rare.png|30px|text-top Victory creature or a creature that costs 10 or more from your hand into the battle zone: ► Search your deck. Take a file:Victory Rare.png|30px|text-top Victory creature or a creature that costs 10 or more from your deck, show that creature to your opponent and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Super Infinite evolution Omega: Put this creature on one or more of your Guardian creatures from the battle zone, your graveyard and/or mana zone. {TRIPLE BREAKER} {ETERNAL OMEGA} (When this creature would leave, return it to your hand instead.) ■ Meteorburn: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent puts that creature into their deck and shuffles it. ■ While this creature is tapped, your opponent's creatures can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} {ETERNAL OMEGA} (When this creature would leave, return it to your hand instead.) ■ When you summon this creature, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge 3 times. Each time you win and reveal a creature, put that creature instead of putting it on the bottom of your deck. Each time you win and reveal a spell, cast it for no cost instead of putting it on the bottom of your deck. ■ Each of your creatures gets "speed attacker".

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever one of your other creatures is put into your graveyard from anywhere, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker" or a creature that has power 5000 or less.
